verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The God of Abraham praise, newline Who reigns enthroned above; newline Ancient of everlasting days, newline And God of love. newline Jehovah, great I Am, newline By earth and heaven confessed; newline I bow and bless the sacred name, newline Forevermore blest.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The God of Abraham praise, newline At whose supreme command; newline From earth I rise, newline And seek the joys newline At His right hand. newline I all on earth forsake, newline Its wisdom, fame, and power; newline And Him my only portion make, newline My shield and tower.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He by Himself hath sworn, newline I on His oath depend; newline I shall on eagles wings upborne, newline To heaven ascend. newline I shall behold His face, newline I shall His power adore; newline And sing the wonders newline Of His grace forevermore.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: The whole triumphant host, newline Give thanks to God on high; newline "Hail, Father, Son and Holy Ghost!" newline They ever cry. newline Hail, Abraham's God and mine! newline I join the heavenly lays, newline All might and majesty are Thine; newline And endless praise. newline Amen.
